description: Report excessive noise disturbances from neighbors, businesses, or public events.

subcategories.name: Loud Parties
subcategories.description: Complaints related to loud parties or gatherings causing disturbance.

subcategories.name: Construction Noise
subcategories.description: Complaints about excessive noise from construction activities.

subcategories.name: Traffic Noise
subcategories.description: Complaints about noise from traffic, including honking, engines, or speeding vehicles.

description: Report maintenance issues in public facilities such as parks, libraries, and community centers.

subcategories.name: Park Maintenance
subcategories.description: Complaints related to the maintenance of parks and recreational facilities.

subcategories.name: Library Facilities
subcategories.description: Complaints about facilities and services provided in libraries.

subcategories.name: Community Center Maintenance
subcategories.description: Complaints related to the maintenance of community centers and public gathering spaces.

description: Report concerns related to law enforcement, including non-emergency issues, traffic violations, and community safety.

subcategories.name: Non-Emergency Issues
subcategories.description: Complaints about non-emergency law enforcement matters, such as noise complaints, suspicious activities, or minor disturbances.

subcategories.name: Traffic Violations
subcategories.description: Report traffic violations, including speeding, illegal parking, running red lights, and reckless driving.

subcategories.name: Community Safety
subcategories.description: Concerns related to community safety, crime prevention, neighborhood watch programs, and public safety initiatives.

description: Report concerns related to housing conditions, property maintenance, and landlord-tenant issues.

subcategories.name: Building Code Violations
subcategories.description: Report violations of building codes, such as unsafe structures, improper renovations, or lack of permits.

subcategories.name: Housing Maintenance Issues
subcategories.description: Complaints about maintenance issues in rental properties or residential buildings, such as leaks, mold, or pest infestations.

subcategories.name: Property Disputes
subcategories.description: Concerns related to property disputes, boundary issues, or disagreements between landlords and tenants.

description: Report concerns related to public infrastructure, including roads, bridges, utilities, and public transportation.

subcategories.name: Road Maintenance
subcategories.description: Complaints about potholes, cracks, road markings, or other issues affecting road safety and condition.

subcategories.name: Bridge Safety
subcategories.description: Concerns related to the safety and condition of bridges, including structural integrity and maintenance.

subcategories.name: Utility Problems
subcategories.description: Report issues with utilities such as water, gas, or electricity, including leaks, outages, or infrastructure damage.

subcategories.name: Public Transportation
subcategories.description: Complaints or suggestions regarding public transportation services, including buses, trains, and stations.

description: Report concerns related to public health hazards, safety violations, and emergency situations.

subcategories.name: Health Code Violations
subcategories.description: Report violations of health codes, including food safety, sanitation, and hygiene.

subcategories.name: Safety Hazards
subcategories.description: Complaints about safety hazards such as slippery floors, broken stairs, or malfunctioning equipment.

subcategories.name: Emergency Situations
subcategories.description: Report emergencies such as fires, natural disasters, medical emergencies, or hazardous spills.

description: Report concerns related to environmental pollution, conservation, and sustainability.

subcategories.name: Air Quality
subcategories.description: Report air pollution, emissions, and concerns related to air quality standards.

subcategories.name: Water Pollution
subcategories.description: Complaints about water pollution, contamination, and issues affecting water quality.

subcategories.name: Waste Management
subcategories.description: Concerns related to waste disposal, recycling programs, and proper waste management practices.

subcategories.name: Natural Resource Conservation
subcategories.description: Report concerns related to the conservation of natural resources such as forests, wildlife, and ecosystems.

description: Report concerns related to transportation infrastructure, traffic congestion, and road safety.

subcategories.name: Road Congestion
subcategories.description: Complaints about traffic congestion, gridlock, and delays on roads and highways.

subcategories.name: Public Transit Delays
subcategories.description: Report delays, disruptions, or issues with public transportation services such as buses, trains, and subways.

subcategories.name: Parking Problems
subcategories.description: Concerns related to parking availability, regulations, and enforcement.

subcategories.name: Road Safety
subcategories.description: Report road hazards, unsafe conditions, and concerns affecting pedestrian and cyclist safety.
